{{Description|"Even when in human form, Kirara's feline hunting instinct never sleeps."|2=[[Dainsleif]] in [https://youtu.be/2kgZ7ZGG5-Q Collected Miscellany - "Kirara: Meow-mentous Speed"]}}
'''Cat's Creeping Carriage''' is [[Kirara]]'s [[Utility Passive]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* This talent also works on animals who produce [[Mysterious Meat]].
* If a character gets too close to the animals, they will still get startled regardless if one was walking or not attacking at all. Likewise, if an animal is killed, the rest nearby will also become startled.
* {{Talent Note|character=Kirara|talent=Cat's Creeping Carriage|alive}}
